scenes.background: You assured Bob about handling workload management on your own. Monica overhears and steps in.
scenes.description: Is that your way of saying you dont need my help?

options.text: No, it’s just a temporary issue. We’ll get through it together.
options.analysis: You reassured Monica and emphasized teamwork, demonstrating social skills and empathy, but your self-regulation could be improved.

options.text: I didn’t mean it that way. Let’s work on a plan to balance things better.
options.analysis: You clarified your statement and suggested a collaborative approach, showing strong perception and empathy.

options.text: If you’re feeling overwhelmed, maybe Bob can help us out?
options.analysis: You suggested involving another colleague, showing motivation and social skills, but empathy and perception were lower.
